answers.text:
Fire departments often bill insurance companies for the roadway cleanup after accidents.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The city of Tempe, AZ interested if other agencies bill people for accidents.  Please forward your replies and any documentation you may have to:
Pamela Muse
pmuse@transformgov.org
888-468-6450
Thank you in advance!
title: Accident Reimbursement
